). Type-locality: United States of America , Pennsylvania , Philadelphia. Additional references:

subSubSection.paragraph:
Syn.
Psychoda tripunctata Macquart, 1838: 85
. Type locality: not given ( France )
.

Syn.

. Type locality: not given (Württemberg).

Syn.

. Type locality: not given ( Great Britain )
.

Syn.

. Type locality: United States of America , Washington , Seattle
.

Syn.

. Type locality: United States of America , Missouri , Columbia
.

Syn.

. Type locality: United States of America , Florida
.

Syn.

. Type locality: India , Calcutta ( W Bengal ), and Simla
.

Syn.

. Type locality: United States of America , Illinois
.

Syn.

. Type locality: United States of America , South Dakota
.

Syn.

.

Tinearia alternata (Say)
: Ježek, 1984: 142 (as type species, list). Additional references: Ježek & Goutner (1995 , Greece records), Duckhouse & Lewis (1989 , e-version, Australian and Oriental catalogue), Wagner (1991 , Palaearctic catalogue), Wagner & Joost (1994 , Colombia records), Ježek (2000, Czech records), Wagner (2001 , Spain records), Ježek (2002 , Slovenia records), Ježek &Yaðci (2005 , Turkey records).

Psychoda ( Tinearia ) alternata Say
:
Bravo et al . (2006b
, diagnosis, Brazil records, list).
General distribution . Cosmopolitan ( Wagner 1991 ) Venezuela ( Cazorla-Perfetti & Morales Moreno 2017 ).

Distribution in Mexico
. Ciudad de México , Michoacán , Morelos , Nayarit , Tamaulipas , Veracruz , Yucatán ( Ibáñez-Bernal 2008 ), Ciudad de México ( Godínez-Álvarez & Ibáñez-Bernal 2010 ).
